title: Christmas cake muffins
ingredients: ['175g butter, softened', '175g soft brown sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '175g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons ground mixed spice', '115g mixed dried fruit', '2 tablespoons brandy or orange juice', 'For the icing', '115g icing sugar', '1 to 2 tablespoons hot water', '12 glace cherries for decoration', 'holly leaves for decoration']
